on the street this week as we're

but what was amazing this summer in New

weren't they were day dresses but they
look like evening dresses so I don't
know whatever it is people really
enjoyed it they were every kind of print
you can imagine broad bands of color
black as you'd expect just everything
you can think of and there weren't just
a few of them there were a lot of them
and many many of them were in a very
fluid Jersey so they had a flow to them
and even in this past two weeks we had
that 90 degree humid weather people kept
on wearing them I mean it reminded me of
the California design out Rudi Gernreich
in about nineteen seventy and he was he
was one who envisioned fashion as the
future with short skirts and legs were
free and he was visiting New York and he
was absolutely dumbfounded he said why
in New York they're wearing their
evening dresses during the day now here
we are 40 years later and we're right
back where we started so there has to be
something there women enjoying it I mean
no one is forcing anyone to do anything
and many many award to business
there was one that amused me it was a
short black dress but it had an over
cage a transparent over cage down to the
ankles but they were just oh every kind
of pattern colors the black ones with
the flower motifs I thought went to Rick
terrific and it just was another
wonderful variation of fashion and our
day that there are no rules you make
your own and you wear what you want the
